title: Sexcapades: Britt and the Butler
description: A weekend fix-up goes awry when Britt prefers the 'help' instead.Britt isn't wild about her friend's plan to set her up with a total stranger that weekend. However, when sinfully sexy Harrington appears, she reconsiders her objections. The script is fine. It’s the cast that needs to change.After meeting the man intended for her, she knows she’s right. Only the butler has bothered to ask what she wants. Her answer is simple—him. ​Enjoy this sexy, saucy, deliciously naughty frolic today.
author: Tara Mills
